data.title: GFBE5D - FireBlade
data.meta_description: Nintendo Wii games database, with information and artwork in all languages, including Japanese, Korean and Chinese.
data.text: synopsis (EN)Budget-priced high-action title that pits players in the cockpit of a military helicopter to indulge in dozens of day and night-based missions, all of which takes place in real world locations. Players take the helm of two distinct choppers and fly attack and rescue missions in 18 different levels. The game features four campaigns in a variety of environments including the Swiss Alps, Arizona Desert, Amazon Jungle and the Arctic Circle. Players blast opponents with the help of high-tech weaponry, including EMP weapons, rail guns, homing missiles, and special turbo upgrades that give the helicopter jet aircraft capabilities.
